channel.title: CVE Feed for Rexroth -- IndraMotion MLC L25, L45, L65, L75, L85, XM21, XM22, XM41 and XM42 IndraMotion XLC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rexroth -- IndraMotion MLC L25, L45, L65, L75, L85, XM21, XM22, XM41 and XM42 IndraMotion XLC

item.title: CVE-2021-23857|2024-08-03T19:14:09.701Z -- rexroth -- indramotion%20mlc%20l25%2C%20l45%2C%20l65%2C%20l75%2C%20l85%2C%20xm21%2C%20xm22%2C%20xm41%20and%20xm42%20indramotion%20xlc
item.description: Login with hash: The login routine allows the client to log in to the system not by using the password, but by using the hash of the password. Combined with CVE-2021-23858, this allows an attacker to subsequently login to the system.
